game.name: Venny's Vinyl Shop
game.shortDescription: Paint your own vinyl designs! Venny's Vinyl Shop lets you manage your dream vinyl store with various customers, lots of paint, and endless fun.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Paint your own vinyl designs! Venny's Vinyl Shop lets you manage your dream vinyl store with various customers, lots of paint, and endless fun.
game.developers: Barış Mert Köse, Thaís Peixoto, Erce Subasi
game.publishers: Barış Mert Köse, Thaís Peixoto, Erce Subasi
